content: When the second Poison Chief is down, return to the Rhino Watch Slope and then head into the area with the flames on the ground. A cutscene will  out as you get there, and the Gold Armored Rhino will appear.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rhino Watch Slope' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Poison Chief 2'.
The content is as follows:
When the second Poison Chief is down, return to the Rhino Watch Slope and then head into the area with the flames on the ground. A cutscene will  out as you get there, and the Gold Armored Rhino will appear.
